full_description: Network Engineer Level 2 in Huntsville, AL at APEX Systems Date Posted: 1/3/2019ApplyNot ready to Apply?Job Snapshot + Employee Type:Contractor + Location: Huntsville, AL + Job Type:Network Admin & Design + Experience:Up to 10 year(s) + Date Posted:1/3/2019Job DescriptionJob #: 844270 Network Engineer + Client is hiring for a Network Engineer with Layer 2 and 3 switching experience to lead configuration efforts on a long term contract + Candidate would maintain and administer computer networks and related computing environments including systems software, applications software, hardware, and configurations. + Candidate would perform disaster recovery operations and data backups when required. + Candidate would protect data, software, and hardware by coordinating, planning and implementing network security measures. + Candidate would troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve hardware, software, and other network and system problems. + Candidate would replace faulty network hardware components when required. + Candidate would maintain, configure, and monitor virus protection software and email applications. + Candidate would monitor network performance to determine if adjustments need to be made + Candidate would confer with network users about solving existing system problems. + Candidate would operator master consoles to monitor the performance of networks and computer systems. + Candidate would design, configure, and test networking software, computer hardware, and operating system softwareQualifications: + Candidate must be able to obtain/maintain a Secret clearance as a condition of employment + 2-10 years of Engineer level Cisco experience + Bachelor's Degree + Knowledge of Network Troubleshooting + Fast learner and be able to multiplex between various tasks and assignments. + Must be an adaptable, self-starter, self-motivated individual capable of working in supervised, and/or, unsupervised environments.
